message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this product.  I think it would be incredibly valuable to you. Given its features and benefits, I'm proposing a starting price of $13,500. What do you think?
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate the value you see in the product. I'm willing to pay up to $12,000 for it.

Bob, I appreciate your interest and counteroffer.  While I understand your perspective on the price, I believe the true value of this product is significantly higher.  I'm willing to come down slightly to $12,800. This feels like a fair compromise that reflects the value you'll gain.
I've considered your proposal, Alice. I'm willing to increase my offer to $12,500. This feels like a fair compromise given the value I believe I'll receive from the product.
